Question: While **** was in Paris, his father was pursuing opportunities for his son back in Salzburg.
Hints: More important is the influence this person had on composers of later generations.
This person died in his home on 5 December 1791(1791-12-05) (aged 35) at 1:00 am.
The baptismal record gives his name in Latinized form as Joannes Chrysostomus Wolfgangus Theophilus ****.
